title: National Coding Championship
description: Our team secured 1st place in the National Coding Championship 2024, competing against 500+ teams nationwide.

title: ICPC Regional Finalists
description: Our university team qualified for the ICPC regional contest, competing with top programmers from South Asia.

title: Best Debate Team Award
description: The JUST Debate Club won the Best Team Award in the National Debate Competition 2024.

title: Hackathon Winners
description: Our students won the National Hackathon by developing an AI-powered smart assistant in just 36 hours.

title: Google Developer Certification
description: Several students received official Google Developer certifications for their expertise in full-stack web development.

title: Startup Incubation Program
description: Our university startup team secured funding and mentorship from a national business incubation program.
